Name: Warmonium
About the game: Warmonium is a turn-based tactics game that features team fighting and multilevel pathfinding. The game is inspired by late 90's to early 2000's board games and offers a unique and engaging experience for fans of strategy war games. One of the key features of Warmonium is its focus on team-based combat. Players must carefully manage their units and use their abilities in coordination with one another in order to outmaneuver and defeat their enemies. The game's multilevel pathfinding system adds an extra layer of strategy, as players must navigate their units through complex and varied environments in order to gain the upper hand. In addition to its competitive multiplayer mode, Warmonium also offers a variety of custom maps and game modes for players to enjoy. This allows players to create their own unique scenarios and challenge themselves in new and interesting ways. Overall, Warmonium is a must-play for fans of strategy war games. Its combination of tactical combat, multilevel pathfinding, and custom maps makes it a truly unique and engaging experience. Whether you're a casual player or a competitive strategist, there's something for everyone to enjoy in Warmonium.
